All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ability
Use this enum to represent abilities.
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
The actor class represents a GameEntity that can perform an Action.
ActorAttribute<T>
An interface that represents an attribute of an actor.
ActorAttributeOperations
 
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Application
 
Application
 
Application
The main class to start the game.
AttackAction
Class representing an action to attack Note that the attacker must have a weapon, e.g., an intrinsic weapon or a weapon item.
AttackBehaviour
Class representing an attack behaviour in the game.
BareFist
Class representing a bare fist
BaseActorAttribute
A class that represents a basic attribute of an actor, such as health.
BaseActorAttributes
 
Behaviour
Created by:
Bug
 
CapabilitySet
A collection of Capability objects.
ConsumableItem
Abstract class representing an item that can be consumed by an actor.
ConsumeAction
Class representing an action for consuming a consumable item.
ConwayGameMap
 
ConwayLocation
 
Crater
 
DemoCapabilities
 
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt on the ground.
Display
Class that manages I/O for the system
DoNothingAction
An action that doesn't do anything.
DropAction
An action for dropping an item from the actor's inventory.
Enemy
 
Exit
Class that represents a route from one Location to another.
Explosion
A class representing an explosion event that may occur during certain conditions, such as a Furnace Golem's attack.
ExplosionEffect
A class representing the effects of an explosion, including dealing damage to nearby actors and setting the ground on fire.
FancyGroundFactory
Class that can create different types of ground based on the character that represents it.
FancyMessage
Fancy messages used to print the game title Font obtained from: link Font: Georgia11 Created by:
Fire
A class that represents a fire on the ground which can burn actors and eventually extinguishes, reverting the ground to its original state.
FlaskOfHealing
Class representing a Flask of Healing, a consumable item that restores health to the actor who consumes it.
FlaskOfRejuvenation
Class representing a Flask of Rejuvenation, a consumable item that restores mana to the actor who consumes it.
Floor
 
Floor
 
Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target actor.
FollowBehaviour
Class representing a behaviour that makes an actor follow a target actor.
FurnaceGolem
Class representing the Furnace Golem For now, it can only wander around the map.
GameEntity
Base class for all objects that can exist in the game.
GameMap
Class representing one map within the system.
Gate
A class representing a Gate in the game world.
GreatKnife
Class representing a Great Knife weapon.
Ground
Class representing terrain type
GroundFactory
Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
IntrinsicWeapon
Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed actor (e.g.
Item
Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.
ItemType
Enum representing different types of items in the game.
KickAction
 
LifeSteal
Class representing the "LifeSteal" weapon art.
Location
Class representing a location in the game map.
LockedDoor
 
MartianItem
 
Menu
A menu GUI implementations
MoveActorAction
An action that moves the actor.
NumberRange
A class that represents an array of sequential numbers.
PickUpAction
An action for picking up an item from the ground.
Player
Class representing the Player.
Player
Class representing the Player.
Player
Class representing the Player, the main character controlled by the user.
PoisonStatusEffect
A class representing the poison status effect applied to an actor.
PoisonSwamp
A class representing a Poison Swamp ground type.
Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
Puddle
A class representing a random puddle of water.
QuickStep
Class representing the "QuickStep" weapon art.
ShadowTree
Represents the Shadow Tree consumable item in the game.
ShadowTreeConsume
Class representing a special action for consuming a Shadow Tree item.
ShortSword
Class representing a Short Sword weapon.
SleepAction
 
SpitBehaviour
 
Status
 
Status
Use this enum class to represent a status.
StatusEffect
Abstract class that represents a status effect that an actor may have For example: an actor might be poisoned after consuming an item.
Stick
 
Tree
WARNING: this might not be the best design to follow :)
Wall
 
Wall
A class representing a wall that cannot be entered by any actor
Wallet
A class that represents a wallet that can be used to store the game's currency.
WanderBehaviour
A class representing a wandering behaviour for actors.
Weapon
Interface for weapon items.
WeaponArt
Interface representing a WeaponArt.
WeaponItem
Abstract class representing items that can be used as a weapon.
WindowSmashAction
 
World
Za Warudo! - DIO Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
